revision.text: Possibly: A new ecclesiastical history of the seventeenth century: containing an account of the controversies in religion ; the lives and writings of ecclesiastical authors, an abridgment of their works, and a judgment on their style and doctrine: also a compendious history of all affairs transacted in the church. By Louis Ellies Du Pin. (Oxford : Printed by L. Lichfield, for T. Combes, at the Bible and Dove in Pater-Noster-Row, London ; and A. Peisley, bookseller in Oxford, 1725.) http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/181887474
